description: This file sets up a knowledge base from a PDF URL, initializes an agent with a Cerebras model, and prompts the agent to answer a question about Thai curry.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads content from a PDF URL and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with a language model and a knowledge base to generate responses.

classes.name: Cerebras
classes.description: A model class representing the Cerebras AI model used for inference.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database class interfacing with PostgreSQL using pgvector.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the model's response to a given prompt, optionally in markdown format.
